DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effectiveness of topical tacrolimus, triamcinolone and placebo in alleviating signs and symptoms of oral lichen planus (OLP).
DOC.brief_title: Tacrolimus Ointment in Oral Lichen Planus
